author: iSazonov
body:
Close #2716 

PS:
Now there is no Verbs<> consts for "Sort","Tee", "Foreach" and "Where". Whether to add them?

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
> Now there is no Verbs<> consts for "Sort","Tee", "Foreach" and "Where". Whether to add them?

Let's leave them as is for now.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: Note that `Sort`, `Tee`, `ForEach`, and `Where` are not approved verbs, which is why we don't have strings for them and `Get-Verb` doesn't return them.  They were considered special cases.

title: Fix Verbs<> class strings  #2716
